meanings: cause-and-effect relationship, (formal) causal relationship[link], (formal) causation, (formal) causality
the causal relationship between poverty and disease

vlive.korean: 시간이 멈춘 세계에서는 인과관계가 진행되지 않기때문에. When the world is frozen, people aren't able to have physical contact. 듣기 View video zzal TV GODAKU : 한번 사용해보고 싶은 애니메이션 필살기 [GO다쿠 시즌3.6 / 12화]
vlive.english: When the world is frozen, people aren't able to have physical contact.

examples.korean: Don’t overuse a causal connective like ‘because’. 발음듣기 because와 같은 인과관계 연결사를 남용하지 말아라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t overuse a causal connective like ‘because’. 발음

examples.korean: the causal relationship between poverty and disease 발음듣기 빈곤과 질병 사이의 인과 관계 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the causal relationship between poverty and disease 발음

examples.korean: evidence for a strong causal link between exposure to sun and skin cancer 발음듣기 햇빛 노출과 피부암 사이의 강력한 인과 관계를 보여주는 증거 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: evidence for a strong causal link between exposure to sun and skin cancer 발음

examples.korean: The causal relationship of this problem isn't clear. 발음듣기 이 문제의 인과관계는 명확하지 않다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The causal relationship of this problem isn't clear. 발음

examples.korean: a strong causal link between smoking and lung cancer 발음듣기 흡연과 폐암 간의 강력한 인과 관계. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
